311b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa ni mtha' dag ma chags pa la sogs pa'i bdag nyid 'gro ba la snang bar byed do// des na 'di spyod lam thams cad dang ldan yang mi dge ba mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir dge ba'i bdag nyid kho na'o// zhes
311b6(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa/ rnal 'byor pa de zhes pa la sogs pa'o// de kho na nyid ni phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhi no// de'i phyir 'khor ba'i nyes pa rnams kyi mi gos so// de'i phyir shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin gnyisu med pa'i byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa kho na
312a1(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa thams cad rnam par spyod pa legs pa thams cad byed pa'o// de 'phags pa klu sgrub zhabs kyi gsungs pa/ 'di ni theg pa che mchog ste// 'di ni byang chub sems mchog go// mnyam par bzhag rnams 'bad pa yi//
312a2(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems ni bskyed par gyis// 'khor ba rang gzhan don sgrub la// byang chub sems las ma gtogs pa'i// thabs gzhan sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni// sngon chad gzigs pa nam yang med ceso// 'di de rnal 'byor mchog de'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs
312a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis phyag 'os// de las byung ba'i rnal 'byor ni// mtha' yas pa rnams rab tu bsgrags// de kho na las tinge 'dzin// mtha' yas pa las yang dag 'byung // phyag rgya dkyil 'khor sngags rnams ni// rnal 'byor de las rnam dag nyid// zhi ba rgyas pa
312a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi las// sngags las skyes pa gzhan gang yang // dza hU'i bu mo'i bye ma'i grangs// ji snyed dngos grub phra rnams dang // phyag rgya'i dngos grub gzhan nyid rnams// ji snyed sa la rnam grangs pa// rnal 'byor 'di las skyes pa ru// thugs kyi rdo rjes gsungs
312a5(rgyud 'grel): pa yin// gang yang nges 'byed cha mthun pa// rnam pa bzhi dang sa bcu dang // 'bras bu la gnas de thams cad// rnal 'byor 'di las yang dag skyes// byung dang gang yang 'byung 'gyur ba// 'byung bzhin pa yi rgyalnga ba'i sras// 'jig rten dbang sogs sems
312a6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' che// de rnams kyang 'o'adi kho nar gnas// 'das dang ma byon sangs rgyas dang // da ltar byung bar 'dod gang dang // ba se ru nyan thos dge 'dun te// de rnams kyang ni 'di las byung // rnal 'byor spyod dang bya ba yi// dbye bas ji snyed sprul pa 'byung // de snyed tha~Mng
312b1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ni// 'di kho na las nges par 'byung // kun tu brtags pa'i ngo bo ni// bag chags stobs las byung rnams dang // ji srid brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos// de snyed de la brten pa'o zhes// 'dod pa lnga rnams med na stong pa nyid ni ro bro ba med pa kho nar 'gyuraro// zhes
312b2(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa ji srid ces pa la sogs pa ste/ ji srid du yul gyi bcud rnams kyi byang chub kyi myu gu skyod par mi byed pa de srid du/ sangs rgyas kyi dpag bsam gyi shing 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ chu bran pa dang bral ba'i myu gu las shing phun sum tshegs pa bzhin no//
312b3(rgyud 'grel): de sa ra ha'i zhabs kyis gsungs pa/ sems kyi myu gu shin tu chung ba ni// yul bcud dag pas gal te mi 'bran na// na mkha' khyab par 'bras bu sbyin pa yis// dpag bsam shing nyid ji ltar thob par 'gyur// zhes so// 'jigs pa med pa'i gzhung 'grel du
312b4(rgyud 'grel): le'u bcu gsum pa'o// // mngon par 'dod pa'i bla na med pa'i don bstan pas rab tu dang ba phul du byung ba skyes pas ji ltar stong pa ston pa'i ched du gsungs pa/ de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o// bde ba chen pos rnam par brtse ba'i phyir lha mo'o// skyed
312b5(rgyud 'grel): byed ma ni lam gyi ngo bo'o// dpal mo ni rtogs pa dang / spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa 'bras bu'i ngo bo'o// rigs med pa rnams cher skrag pa'i gnas nyid kyi phyir 'jigs pa'o// grags chen ma ni rnam par thos pa'i grags can no// byams pa'i rang bzhin nyid
312b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi phyir mnyes shin ma'o// dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i phyir lha mo'o// snying rje chen po dang shes rab chen po dag las tha dad ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir phyag rgya chen po ste 'di dag gis rang don phun
313a1(rgyud 'grel): sum tshogs pa'o// don chen 'bras bu ston mdzad ma// don chen ni rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid do// de kho na lam goms pa'i 'bras bu dam pa ste/ de gdul bya rnams la ston no// zhes pa gzhan don phun sum tshogs pas bstod par byed do// bstan pa'i//
313a2(rgyud 'grel): yul gyi sgo nas bstod/ sangs rgyas zhes pa la sogs pa'o// sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rnams kyiso// gang rnams kyi zhes pa dngos grub gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang spyod yul ma yin pa'o// lha
313a3(rgyud 'grel): mo zhes pa lha mos so// gsung gcig gis zhes pa thog mar go dka' ba brjod nas tshig gzhan gyi gsal bar byas pa ni ma yin pa'o// chen po'i snod ni chen po 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub rnams kyi snod do// kun zhes
313a4(rgyud 'grel): pa rnal 'byor ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i ngo bo'o// gang rnams de rnams ni gang dngos grub de'o// gsungs pa ni sna tshogs sde ma so// 'di ni zhes pa 'di'i'o// sangs rgyas yon tan rnams ni stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa rnams te/ de rnams kyang bdag la
313a5(rgyud 'grel): bzod mdzod cig ste/ gang gi phyir de rnams kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid ni rgyal ba mchog rnams kyi gdul bya rnams la sbas pa'o// shin tu rnyed dka'i don shin tu sbas pa'i spyod yul can gyi rgyud 'dir bdag gis gsal bar byas pa'o// de'i phyir bdag gi
313a6(rgyud 'grel): sgo nas de rnams kho nas 'di bstan pa'o// zhes dgongs pa'o// bdag la yang phyin ci log tu bstan pa'i gnod pa sgro btags pa las mi bzod pa bya ba min// zhes gsungs po rgyal ba mchog rnams bzod mdzod cig/ ces rnam dbye ba bskur ba'o// rgyud
313b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad gsungs nas/ dbang bskur rnams kho na 'di la dbang du bya'o// zhes bstan pa'i ched du dbang bskur gsungs pa/ de nas zhes pa la sogs pa'o// gsol ba gang ba ste gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur gyi don du'o// lha mo chen mo la'o// bcang
313b2(rgyud 'grel): ces pa khyod kyis s+ho// g.yogs zhes klog pa la ni khyab par byed pa ste/ bdag la'o// de'i zhes pa mo de'i'o// ces 'di ltar shes rab ma mgu bar bya ba la 'bad ces na gsungs pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ni mchod/ rgyu dang 'bras bu'i gnas skabs dag
313b3(rgyud 'grel): tu las kyu phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor kho nas phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub bo zhes pa man ngag go// ji ltar na 'di ltar yin zhes gsungs pa 'di kho na la ste shes rab ma la sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams bzhugs te/ de rnams bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin
313b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams yin zhing / do'i rten yang shes rab ma ste/ de las cho ga ji lta bar shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur blang bar bya'o// de nyid kyi phyir shes rab ye shes kyi rang gi ngo bo gsal bar byed de/ dbang po zhes pa la sogs pa dbang pos nye bar mtshon pa las
313b5(rgyud 'grel): yul la sogs pa yang ngo // bdag ces pa bdag gi sems te/ sems ni bdag ces brtags pa'o// zhes pa'i gsung las so// yang na bdag tu gdags pa'i yul nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rnams bdag 'di thams cad rang bzhin med pa ste/
313b6(rgyud 'grel): gang du nye bar mi dmigs pa de mchog tu dga' ba rtogs pa'o// mchog dga' ni 'dir lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' kho na dang ming gzhan shes rab ye shes te/ dbang po la sogs par sgro btags pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro// de brtag pa gnyis pa'i rgyud du
314a1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa/ mchog tu dga' ba thob na ni// sna tshogs spangs pa'i skad cig la zhes so// 'char pa'i rim pa kho nas 'di'i yang dag 'thob rtogs par bya'o// de'ang le'u dang por dpyad zin to// mchog tu dga' ba kha~M
314a2(rgyud 'grel): na la rgyu nyid kyis phyag 'tshal te/ de la zhes pa la sogs pa'o// gang zhig shar bas ni lhan cig skyes pa gang shar bas so// 'bras bu nyid kyis phyag 'tshal te/ gang yang goms pa las nges par 'byed pa'i cha la phan pa la sogs pa
314a3(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa'i rim gyis mngon dga' ste/ kun nas mngon par shes pa dang / stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa phul du byung ba'i yon tan rin chen rnams yang dag par 'byor pa ni/ rgyal ba rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa ma lus
314a4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bral ba'i phyir mdzes pa kun tu bzang po mchog tu dgyes par gnas pa'i sku ste sku bzhi pa rdo rje 'chang mkhas pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs la/ de'i bdag nyid du rnam par rtog pa'i g.yeng ba ma lus pa
314a5(rgyud 'grel): spangs pa'i phyir sbas te/ tshig dang blo'i spyod yul ci yang ma yin pa'o// de nyid kyi phyir 'di rtogs nas/ sna tshogs sde ma la sogs pa rnams mi smra bar gyur nas gnas par 'chad par 'gyuraro// gcig pu ni gnyi su med pa'i mchog tu dga'
314a6(rgyud 'grel): ba ste/ sgrib pa thams cad kyi bag chags lhag ma'i gnyid dang bral ba'i phyir sad pa ste/ de la phyag 'tshalo// de nas tshigasu bcad pa 'dis shes rab ye shes de nyid khyad par ba'i ngo bor chu'i rlabs kyi ngo bo bzhin du byung ba ni dbang bzhi pa zhes
314b1(rgyud 'grel): gsung so// de 'dri bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa ni rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi'o zhes pa'o 'jigs pa med pa'i gzhung 'grel du le'u bcu bzhi pa rdzog so// / he ru ka dpal dpa' bo'i lam ni rnam par bkral las dge ba cher byung
314b2(rgyud 'grel): bas/ 'khor ba'i 'khrul mang bcad nas 'gro 'dri de yis dkyil 'khor du ni 'du bar shog/ bdag ni thub pa 'di yi mtha' yas spyani yun ring rnam par 'dzin byed cing / srog rmugs so so la gzhol che ba'i dade ba spros pa 'jigs pa 'dzin gyur cig/
314b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam gnon tshul gyis mkhas pa ni/ 'jigs pa med pas gnang reg tshig/ dga' ba skyong gi rgyal srid lo// nyi shu lnga la 'di byas so// srid gsum rnam rgyal phun tshogs sna gzhi ma nyams sku can gyis// 'gro la chung min phan bya'i ched du bsags pa
314b4(rgyud 'grel): yi/ ma ga d+ha dag sras po dpal ldan gnod sbyin skyong gi mthu// brtan pa yongs 'gyur chad du nges don gnyer las 'di gzhung byas// dga' ba'i bde sbyin gnyis med dam pa'i bcud kyi rol pa las// 'phrul pa'i sa gzhi rdo rje btsun mo ni// rtsen pa shas
314b5(rgyud 'grel): rab dpal 'dis thugs pa'i tshogs kyis bkod pa bsgrigs pa'i tham skas phreng ba gang gi gnas// ma byas byas don don gnyer yang dag rtog pa'i stobs can du ni rgyal mdzad gyur cig de yis yang // kho bos bkral bas mnyam med dge ba bdud rtsis
314b6(rgyud 'grel): gang ba don du gnyer bya'i tshim pa 'byung gyur cig/ tshigs bcad brgya phrag bcu drug ni// rkang bcad 'di ni bsdoms pa'i tshad// mkhas pa rnams kyi rgyan ched 'di'i// tshad bzhin snying la dngos po nyid// ces pa dpal sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud chen po'i
315a1(rgyud 'grel): 'grel pa mi 'jigs pa'i gzhung 'grel gnas brtan mkhas pa a b+hA yA ka ra ku pa ta yis mdzad pa rdzogaso// / 'di ni sngon lo tsa ba mkhas pa zhig gis bsgyur ba la/ bar skabasu dpe stor bas ma tshang ba las/
315a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang lo tsa ba dge slong blo gros brtan pas/ spyi bo ltas pa mkhan po 'jam dpal ser po'i gsung gi bskul te/ le'u dang por der bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag rgya chen po rdo rje zhes pa nas/ 'og gi lam nas byung zhes pa'i bar dang / lha'i sku sgom
315a3(rgyud 'grel): pa kho na gsungs te/ gang gsungs pa zhes pa nas brtan pa sa gzhi la sogs pa rnams dang g.yo ba ces pa'i bar dang / le'u gsum pa'i mjug he ru ka'i gzugasasu bsgom pa rdzogs pas zhes pa nas le'u bzhi pa'i tha mal ni 'dir ma rig pa ste
315a4(rgyud 'grel): des zhes pa'i bar dang / le'u bcu gsum pa'i dbu'i de kho na nyid ni thams cad la zhes pa nas le'u bcu bzhi pa'i mjug na gang zhig shar bas ni zhes pa'i bar dang / srid gsum rnam rgyal zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad gnyis rnams hor kong
315a5(rgyud 'grel): bas bas shing lhag ma rnams la zhu chen bgyis nas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// 'dis 'gro ba thams cad la phan par shog/ 'di'i 'gyur snga ma ni lo tsa ba chen po ding ri chos grags zhes bya ba yin zhes thos so//
315a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ shrI bud+d+ha ka pA li sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal sangs rgyas thod pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal sangs rgyas thod pa la phyag 'tshalo// khrag 'thung yon tan zab mnga' ba// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog/ sen
315b1(rgyud 'grel): kun la phan dgyes dang // sna tshogs sde la rtag tu 'dud// ji ltar bla mas bstan pa yi// bla ma brgyud rim las 'ongs pa// sems can gang gis shes 'gyur ba// de ltar bdag gi sgrub thabs bshad// // dang po re zhig rnal 'byor pas
315b2(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i stan la 'dug ste/ rang gi snying gar dbyangs yig dang po las skyes pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de'i steng du yi ge hUM 'od zer lnga dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bdag nyid bsam par bya'o// de nas hUM des 'od zer las byung
315b3(rgyud 'grel): pabapa gshin rje che ba ma la sogs pa mchod pa'i lha mo rnams spros te/ phreng bzang ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma nyi shu rtsa bzhis bskor ba sna tshogs sde ma la 'khyud pa'i he ru ka bdud rtsi lnga'i mchod pas mchod par bya'o// mchod pa thams
315b4(rgyud 'grel): cad kyis yang dag par mchod nas de'i mdun du dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa dran pa dang / sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o// // rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du ni snying rje dang por bsgom pa yin la/ rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud 'dir ni
315b5(rgyud 'grel): byams pa dang por bsgom par bya'o// de nas snying rje de'i rjes la dga' ba thams cad kyi tha mar btang snyomaso// de nas rang gri snying gar nyi ma la gnas pa'i hU~M bsam par bya'o// de nas 'og gi rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyar bas hUM las
315b6(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer 'phros pas lus mtha' dag yang dag par bsregs te/ thams cad stong pa nyid du bsam par bya'o// de nas yi ger ma gyur pa las nyi ma nyi ma'i steng du yi ge hUM de dag yongasu gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbusu
316a1(rgyud 'grel): hUM kho na bsam par bya'o// 'di las rdo rje nag pa'i 'od zer 'phros pas ra ba dung 'dra ba'i mtshams bcing bar bya'o// rdo rje gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje'i sa gzhi bsgom par bya'o// rdo rje sa gzhi'i dbus su chud par e grwa gsum
316a2(rgyud 'grel): byad chos kyi 'byung gnas bsgom par bya'o// de nas de'i dbus 'byung ba chen po bzhi bsam par bya ste/ yaM gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu'i rnam pa lta bu ba dan gnyis kyis mtshan pa bsam par bya'o// de yang rtsa rnams bskyod pa'i gzugs
316a3(rgyud 'grel): can 'khor lo thams cad thim bzhin pa de'i dbusu rnal 'byor pa gnas par bya'o// 'dis ni rlung gi dag pa gsungaso// raM gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po gru gsum 'bar ba bdun gyi mtshan pa bltas te/ rtsa bco brgyad kyi gnas nas 'dzag
316a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin par byed pa bsam par bya'o// baM gyur pa las chu'i dkyil 'khor dkar po zlum po bum pas mtshan pa bsdam par bya ste/ rtsa'i 'khor lo thams cad chu'i dkyil 'khor la thim par gyur pa bsam par bya'o// laM gyur pa las sa'i dkyil 'khor
316a5(rgyud 'grel): gru bzhi ser po rdo rjes mtshan po bsam par bya'o// de ltar 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge bzhis byin gyis brlabs pa bsgom par bya'o// de nas 'byung ba chen po bzhi gyur pa las khang pa brtsegs pa gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi rta babs
316a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhis brgyan pa dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas brgyan pa g.yer ka'i dra bas mdzes shing ka ba brgyad kyi nye bar spras pa bsam par bya'o// 'di'i dbusu pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pas spras pa bsam par bya'o// de'i dbus chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid kyi ro bsam
316b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// der a la sogs pa'i dbyangs yig bcu drug nyis skor du byas pa'i yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis gyur pa las dkyil 'khor ro// de ni me long lta bu'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'o// de la ka la sogs pa sum cu rtsa bzhi la ya rA la wa Da d+ha
316b2(rgyud 'grel): drug bstan pas bzhi bcur gyur te/ de yang nyis 'gyur du byas pa'i yi ge brgyad cu gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro// de ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin no// 'di dag ni dbus su yi ge hUM shes rab dang thabs kyis bsam
316b3(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// de ni so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no// hUM gyur pa las rdo rje'i lte ba la yang hUM bsam par bya'o// de ni bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhi no// 'di dag yongasu gyur pa las sna tshogs sde mas 'khyud pa'i sangs
316b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thod pa he ru ka bsgom par bya ste/ kun da dkar po dang zla ba 'dra ba'i 'od mtshungs pa zla ba ltar 'tshar zhing nor bu'i 'od ltar 'phro ba zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas na gri gug dang thod pa g.yon na kha T+wAM ga dang rdo rje man ngag las
316b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par khong du chud par bya'o// 'di ye shes rab ma sna tshogs snga ma ni zhal gcig ma phyag gnyis ma sgra sgrol ma he ru ka la 'khyud de gnas pa/ gcer bu mgo'i phreng ba dang bral ba/ mchod phyir thogs pa/ bde ba thams cad rig cing
316b6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs mdzes ma/ g.yas na cang te'u steng na gri gug/ g.yon na kha T+wAM ga 'phyar zhing phyag na thod pa bsnams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs can ma bsgom par bya'o// shar gyi 'dab ma la phreng bzang ma mdog dkar mo'o// byang gi
317a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dab ma la 'dod can ma mdog ser mo'o// nub kyi 'dab ma la 'jigs ma mdog dmar mo'o// lho'i 'dab ma la thub dka' ma mdog nag mo ste/ 'di dag nyi ma la gnas shing skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs pa zhal
317a2(rgyud 'grel): cig phyag gnyis ma gri gug dang thod pa phyag na bsnams pa bsam par bya'o// mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhi la bdud rtsis gang ba'i thod pa bzhi'o// dbus kyi 'dab ma ni rdo rje phreng bas brgyan pa'o// rim pa gnyis pa'i rtsibs brgyad pa la/ pad+ma'i
317a3(rgyud 'grel): phreng bas brgyan pa ste/ de'i shar gyi rtsibs la dge ba'i ske rags ma'o// byang gi rtsibs la gzugs can ma'o// nub kyi rtsibs la rnam rgyal ma'o// lho'i rtsibs la byed ma'o// dbang ldan gyi rtsibs la thod can ma'o// me'i rtsibs la mtshon chen ma'o//
317a4(rgyud 'grel): bden bral gyi rtsibs la rgyud byed ma'o// rlung gi rtsibs la bdud byed ma ste/ rnal 'byor ma 'di dag ni mdog dmar mo nyi ma'i gdan la gnas pa/ zhal gcig mo phyag gnyis ma skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas shing phyag na gri gug dang thod
317a5(rgyud 'grel): pa bsnams pa'o// rim pa gsum pa'i rtsibs brgyad pa la rdo rje phreng bas brgyan pa ste/ de'i shar phyogs kyi rtsibs la sgrol byed ma'o// byang gi rtsibs la 'jigs ma'o// nub kyi rtsibs l-i lA ma'o// lho'i rtsibs la mi 'pham ma'o// dbang ldan
317a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi rtsibs la dge ma'o// me'i rtsibs la 'jur byed ma'o// bden bral gyi rtsibs la dus mtshan ma'o// rlung gi rtsibs la grags chen ma'o// rnal 'byor ma 'di dag ni mdog dkar mo nyi ma'i stan la gnas pa zhal cig phyag gnyis ma gri gug dang
317b1(rgyud 'grel): thod pa bsnams pa'o// shar gyi sgor mdzes ma mdog dkar ma'o// byad kyi sgor nor 'dzin ma mdog ser ma'o// nub kyi sgor sbrul bzangs ma mdog dmar mo'o// lhor skor grags mthong ma mdog nag mo'o// rnal 'byor ma 'di dag ni ro dang nyi ma
317b2(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pa byams pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can g.yon brkyang ba'i zhabs kyi gnas pa gar madz+nyAd bzhin mA/ zhal cig phyag gnyis ma gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa he ru ka la kun tu blta ba'o// sgo srungs ma gtogs pa'i rnal
317b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ma rnams ni skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas pa/ stegs gis pags pas sked pa dkris shing rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'od zer rnon pos gtibs pa/ skra ser po gyen du 'bar ba/ kha nas khrag 'thor ba thams cad khu ba dang
317b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa bsgom par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das rdzogs pa'i dus su rnal 'byor ma thams cad skad cig gis rnam pas hUM lus rdzogs par 'gyur bya ste/ de ltar lha mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang ldan par bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o// de nas lha mo
317b5(rgyud 'grel): nyi shu rtsa bzhis mchod nas thod pa'i bdud rtsi lnga gsol bar mdzad do// de nas sna tshogs sde ma'i pad+ma la a he ru ka'i rdo rje la hUM bsam te/ sna tshogs sde ma dang bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi rdo rje dang pad+ma sbyor ba mdzad nas/ yang lha
317b6(rgyud 'grel): mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi la 'dod pa spyad cing chags pa chen po la shin tu chags pas zhu bar gyur nas/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su khu bas gnas// zhu ba de mthong nas byams pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis sgo srungs rnams kyi blus//
318a1(rgyud 'grel): bskul ba ci ste 'jig rten snyan mnan na// ci phyir khyod ni mi dgyes 'gyur// gal te khyod bdag tshig gsan na// mi dgyes gyur pa mtha' dag mthong // mdzes sdug mas bskul ba'o// stong pa'i thugs ni ma mdzad par//
318a2(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi dgongs pa grags par mdzod// srid 'jigs skye bo kun slu bas// rnal 'byor ma'i grogs po bzhengs// nor 'dzin pas bskul ba'o// sngon gtso gal te tshig gsan na// bya ba yal bar ma dor gcig/ khyod mi snang na 'gro ba kun// 'gro
318a3(rgyud 'grel): bar ltung bas mi dgar gyur// skal bzang mas bskul ba'o// log pa'i nga rgyal ma mdzad par// grags pas stong pa'i rang bzhin mthong // dngos po mtha' dag khyod thong la// rnal 'byor ma yi rogs la spyod// grags mthong mas bskul ba'o//
318a4(rgyud 'grel): de ltar glus bskul ma thag tu/ khu ba'i gzugs las a dang hUM de gnyis las gri gug dang rdo rje/ gri gug dang rdo rje las he ru ka sku mdog sngon po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ gtso bo hUM zhes sgrogs pa'i sngon du gsungs pa'i mtshan ma dang ldan
318a5(rgyud 'grel): pa skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas pa 'jigs shing khro ba'i bdag nyid stag gi pags pa'i na bza'/ brlabs pa/ mgo bo rlon pa bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i phreng ba 'chad pa/ mchod phyir thogs pa shin tu bzhed pa drag po chen po'i snying rje'i bdag
318a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi gtso bo lta'o// dpung rgyan mgu do 'khor gdub dang / gcer bu rked du ska rag bcings// rkang brgyan sil sil sgra sgrogs shing // bdud kun rab tu 'joms par byed// ral pa'i cod pan yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can// zla ba
318b1(rgyud 'grel): phyed pa 'dzin pa'i lha// dbul sna tshogs rdo rjes mnan// 'khor lo rna cha mgul ngo dang // gdu bu dang ni ske rags nyid// phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa'i mgom// thal ba'i rdul gyis byug shing 'jigs// thod pa gti mug gi brgyan pa// dpa' bo 'khor ba sgrol ba
318b2(rgyud 'grel): byed// byang chub sa bon rang bzhin can// dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom par bya'o// gtso bo'i shes rab chen mo sna tshogs sde ma rnal 'byor ma ni gcig pu mgo bo'i phreng ba dang bral ba rgyan med cing mchod phyir thogs pa dang bral ba thams cad bde ba
318b3(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa zhal cig phyag gnyis ma skra grol ma sku mdog dkar mo zhal shin tu 'gyur ba mche ba cung zad gtsigs pas 'jigs pa/ g.yas na cang te'u dang gri gug g.yon na khA T+wAM gA dang thod pa bsnams pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i lha mo de ltar
318b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya'o// da ni bdag nyid kyi snying ga dang dpral ba dang spyi gtsug dang / dpung pa gnyis dang / mig gnyis dang / gsang ba dang lus thams cad kyi gnas bdun du/ oM hUM hau ha~M hrIM hU~M hA zhes pa'i sngags 'di rnams kyi cho ga bya'o// snying gar
318b5(rgyud 'grel): hUM las thugs rdo rje'o// mgrin par AHlas gsung rdo rje'o// spyi bor oM las sku rdo rje'o// sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlabs nas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang bar bya ste/ snying glar zla ba la gnas pa'i hUM gi 'od zer lcags kyu
318b6(rgyud 'grel): lta bu bsgoms pa dang / oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni aHkhaM graM druM shAM oMHaHaHhUM hUM hU~M phaT/ ces pa bsgyings pa dang bcas pas sngags bzlas pas/ ye shes sems dpa' bkug ste/ dam tshig sems dpar bcug pas/ chu dang 'o ma ltar/
319a1(rgyud 'grel): thim par bsam par bya'o// de ltar dpa' bo rdzogs pa mthong nas rtsa yi 'khor lo 'jug ste/ 'dzag pa de las rnal dusbyor ma rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin/
319a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs pa/ gos sna tshogs gyon pa gzugs gzhon pas brgyan pa/ lo bcu gnyis ma'i rnal 'byor ma brgyad bskyed de na mkha'i phyogasu gnas te/ bum pa byang chub sems kyi yongasu gang ma a 'dra'i shing los kha brgyan po
319a3(rgyud 'grel): brgyad thogs pa de thams cad du dang zhing bzhad pa'i zhal gyis rgyal gyur he ru ka zhes smra ba/ mgon pos mthong nas dbang bskur ba'i mchog la gsol ba gdab par bya'o// brtse ldan grags pa chen po yi// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dbang bskur//
319a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bu'i 'dam d+ma bying ba'i bdag/ dbang bskur ba yi bdag sgrol mdzod// ji lta bu che med pa'i khyim// shim thag tu stong par 'gyur// de bzhin dbang dang bral na ni// me shes kun gyis stong par 'gyur// tshigs pa shangad 'dis lasang nga'i dang
319a5(rgyud 'grel): bstan to// ji ltar pi wang sbyor kun tshogs// rgyud dang bral na brdung mi rung // de ltar dbang dang bral na ni// sngags dang bsam gtan 'grub mi 'gyur// tshigs bshad 'dis ni shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bstan to// dadang med na nyes pa che bar
319a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba de ltar yang gsungs te/ rmongs pa gang zhig dbang med par// bdag ni dbang bskur zhes smra ba// ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs kyi bar// slob mar bcas te dmyal bar 'gro// tshigs bcad 'dis ni dbang med pa'i nyes pa bstan
319b1(rgyud 'grel): b+h+yo/ de ltar mkhyen mdzod rnal 'byor ma// slar yang bdag la dbang bskur gsol// gal te dbang bskur skye med nA// he ru ka ru bdag gyur TIg/ de nas rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis rgyal gyur rgyal gyur zhes pas bcom ldan 'das la khrus gsol
319b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing dbang bskur ro// phyi dang gsang bar bcas pa'i dbang bskur ba tsam gyis na mkha'i ngos nas rnga'i sgra grag cing tsan dan dang me tog gi 'char 'bab par 'gyuraro// dbang bskur zin nas rnal 'byor ma rnams rtsa'i 'khor lo la thim par
319b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur to// dkyil 'khor ba'i 'khor lo thams cad la rang gi rigs kyis rgyas gdab par gyur to// de nas glu'i bstod pa dang / mchod pa dang bdud rtsi lngas bcom ldan 'das mchod par bya'o// de nas yaM gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor
319b4(rgyud 'grel): de'i steng du raM gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du aM gyur pa las thod pa/ thod pa'i dbus su bi mu ra su ma gyur pa las bdud rtsi lnga'o// go ku da ha na gyur pa las sha lnga bsam mo// de nas rlung gi me sbar zhing mes thod pa sros
319b5(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di las rdo rje'i rnam pa lta bu'i rlangs pa 'byung ngo // yang bsil bar byas pa'i phyir thod pa'i steng mtho gang tsam du oM gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin oM gyis byin gyis brlabs pa de las kha ba lta bu'i
319b6(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi babs pas bsil bar 'gyur ro// de kho na nyid gsum gyis lha rnams tshim par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rtag tu rmi lam dang sgyu ma lta bur bsgom par bya'o// lte bar aHsnying gar hUM/ mgrin par oM
320a1(rgyud 'grel): dpral bar sgra dang thig ler ldan pa mi shigs pa'i haM ngo // sa sogs 'byung ba chen po bzhis// 'khor lo bzhi ru rab tu phye// thun mtshams bzhi ru byin gyis brlabs// pad+ma bzhi las yang dag 'byung /
320a2(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba bzhi yi rang bzhin gyis// sbyor ba bzhi la kun tu brten// mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs kyis ni// bya ba byed pa po rang bzhin// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gzugs can// ci bde ba ru 'di ru rol// rlung gi 'gro 'ong bsgoms
320a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// thim 'gyur bde chen skye bar 'gyur// rtsa brgyad phyogs kyi 'dab ma ni// 'byung chen bzhi yi rang bzhin no// mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhi po ni// bdud rtsi lnga yis rang bzhin gyis// de ru mchod pa'i gzugs su gnas//
320a4(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// nyi shu rtsa bzhir yang dag gsungs// de nyid phyi yi dkyil 'khor ni// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i rang bzhin no// sna tshogs sde dang ldan gcig tu// bcom ldan 'das ni dbus su bzhugs// sprul pa'i
320a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo drug cu rtsa bzhi'i dbus su o thig le'i gzugs can ne// snying ga'i 'khor lo brgyad kyis dbus su// hUM thig le'i gzugs can no// oM gyi 'od zer steng du 'gro bzhin pa dang / hUM gi 'od zer 'og tu 'gro bzhin pa/
320a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ka 'dus te thig le'i gzugs la thim pa de'i tshe bde ba thob ste/ de ltar na 'byung ba dang 'jug pa bsgom par bya'o// zla ba drug tu sbyor ba la goms par byas pas/ 'dir 'grub par som nyi med // bsgom pas
320b1(rgyud 'grel): skyo mar gyur na sngags kyis bzlas pa bya'o// oM hrI bud+d+ha d+h+r-i kA pA li ni a/ 'jug pa la oM/ 'byung ba la d+hI/ gnas pa la bud+d+ha/ bde ba la d+d+ha/ nub pa la ka pA la ni/ ltung ba la A'o// de ltar yan lag drug
320b2(rgyud 'grel): gr-I nang gi bdag nyid kyi sngags kyis bo zlas pa bya'o// 'od nyid la goms pa'i sbyor bas sangs rgyas su 'gyur tAM/ gzhan du ma yin no// rtsa bo'i sngags so// oM prad+d+ha ka pA ma~M ni/ oM hU~M haM hUM phaT stong po sngags/
320b3(rgyud 'grel): oM ka pA la badz+ri ni hU~M hu~M dur k+She hU~M phaT/ nye bo'i snying po'i sngags so// oM mad+h+r-i kA pA la badz+re tsi tre oM la bA ne b+h+r-i na ya sarba d+h+yA taM na mU r+yAn ki la ya sarba bAn+d+ha naM/ u nA Ta~M s+ya sarba big+h+nA na bi drA me ya b+haM ga ba tI yak+sha nAN s+yA
320b4(rgyud 'grel): pi shwa tsa mA sho Sha ya dza Ta ya saMp+ta pA tA la gA ta na sa rA sa ra pra sa rA pra sa ra hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ thun bzhi ru dkyil 'khor lo na bzhir spros te/ 'odir gtor ma sbyin par bya'o// 'byung po thams cad kyis gtor ma'i
320b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags so// sangs rgyas thod pa'i lha nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid kyis bsgrubs thabs/ slob dpon chen po s+yA ra ha'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
320b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po shrI ga ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o//
321a1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sarbab+hU ta ba badz+ra d+d+ha/ bad skad du/ 'byung ba thams cad kyu gtar ma chag+sas/ sang sa rgyas mthong ba lnga thag 'amal ga/ dngos kun ra bzhin 'a bzag/ hA/
321a2(rgyud 'grel): bde la phyag 'tshal nas// bla mas brtan pa'i rim bzhin du// sems can don phyir gtor ma bshad// re zhig dang po nyid du ni// yul gyi nyes pa spong byed sngags// brjod pas dngos kun stong par bsgom// de nas
321a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur nyi mo la// hUM bas ma yongasu gyur pa las// sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom byas nas// ra ba dra ba sa gzhi bsam// de nang skad cig tsam las ni// 'khro bo gsum gyi lha rnams dang // khams gsum sems can ma lus
321a4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ phyogs skyong mkha' 'gror bcas pa bskyed// bdag ni de rnams mdun na gnas// he ru ka'i gzugs bsam la// gnas bdun go cha gsal bar dgod// de nas mdun du yaM las ni// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam par
321a5(rgyud 'grel): byad de steng r-i ni yongs gyur pas// me'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'o// de steng a las thod pa'o// thod pa dkar po'i dbus su ni// bi mu ra su ma lnga las// bdud rtsi lnga na bskyed pa'o// go ku da ha na las ni// lcags kyu
321a6(rgyud 'grel): lnga yang de bzhin bsam// de nas rlung gi me sbyar zhing // thod pa dros pa'i rlangs pa ni// rdo rje rnam pa'i gzugs brnyan byung // de yang bsil bar bya ba'i phyir// thod pa'i steng gi mtho gang du// oM gyur zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni//
321b1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi rang bzhin oM gyis ni// steng nas byin gyis brlab par bsam// de nas pa mo lta bu yi// bdud rtsi babs pas bsil bar gyur// de nyid gsum gyi gsang sngags ni// lan bdun bzlas pas byin gyis brlabs// de rjes snying
321b2(rgyud 'grel): ga'i sa bon gyis// ye shes bskul zhing gsang sngags brjod// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni aHkhaM graM druM shwA aHaHhUM hUM hUM phaT/ bsgyings bcas sngags ni zlos bzhis pas// 'khor lo gsum gyi lha rnams dang // zhi byed bde byed 'byung ngo
321b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams// tshogs bcas myur du bkug nas kyang // dam tshig tshogs la thim gyur pa// chu dang 'o 'drar tha dad med// de nas spos dang me tog sogs// gzhan yang yid la byung ba yi// rdo rje mche sogs rnams kyi mchod// lha rnams lce ni
321b4(rgyud 'grel): nas 'bras tsam// bu gu can gyi rdo rjer bsam// de yi rtse mor oM bsam ste// 'od zer gyis drangs gsol bar bsam// 'khor lo gsum gyi lha rnams la// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni ba li krih+Na krih+Na gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya kha kha hUM/
321b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi zhing skyong 'byung po la// yongasu bsngo ba'i sngags brjod de// oM ma hA ka pA la badz+re tsi tre pu tse tre/ a laM ba ne prI na ya sarba b+hU ta na sarba ma ra ya mA ra ya kI la ya/ ma ra la duSh+TA na uts+tshu Ta ya~M sarba big+h+nAM bi tra ya/ b+ho d+ha
321b6(rgyud 'grel): ga ba ti/ yak+Sha rak+Sha sa pi shwa tsa sho Sha ya tra ya sap+ta pa tA la dz+nyA na sa ra sa ra pra sa ra pra sa ra hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ de nas tshim par gyur nas su// smon lam mthar ni dag par bya// chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/
322a1(rgyud 'grel): dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med// gzung du med cing brjod du med// rgyu dang las la kun tu byung // ngo bo nyid med gnas med par// de ltar chos 'di shes par gyis// sems can don ni mnyam med byos// /
322a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa nas/ 'on te sangs rgyas sras su skye// sems can thams cad bder gyur cig/ sems can thams cad sdig med pa'i// sangs rgyas nyid du phrad gyur cig/ lam de nyid du zhugs nas kyang // ma grol ba rnams
322a3(rgyud 'grel): grol bar shog/ ma brgal ba rnams brgal bar shog/ rnal 'byor gtsug lag dam pa la// da lta nyid du gnas par shog/ lag pa brkyang ste sa la bzhag/ se gol lan gsum gdab bya zhing // dril bu dkrol bas der
322a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bad pas// mgron rnams gshegasu gsol bar bya// sangs rgyas thod pa'i 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga/ slob dpon sa ra ha pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// /
322a5(rgyud 'grel): ga ya d+ha ra dang gyi rngo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// /
323a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal sangs rgyas thod pa'i cho ga bzhugs so//
323b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ nI bud+d+ha kA pA la maN+Da la kra ma pa d+yo ta na nA ma bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ dpal sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rim pa gsal ba/ dpal sangs rgyas thod pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
323b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po che// nyi shu rtsa bzhi dra ba'i sdom// dngos kun rang bzhin 'gro ba skyob// sna tshogs ste la phyag 'tshal te// sangs rgyas thod pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ ji ltar rgyud gzhan cho ga mthong // bla ma brgyad rim las 'ongs
323b3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ bdag gi gsal bar bshad par bya// bla ma mtshan nyid bzang ldan pa// brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan// bzod ldan drang la g.yo rgyu med// sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor shes pas// legs par brtags pa'i slob ma'o phyir// dkyil 'khor bri ba'i
323b4(rgyud 'grel): las bya'o// de yang slob ma blo chen po// shin tu dad pa'i sems dang ldan// 'dod med dbang po dul ba dang // chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs// sems can don la shin sbyor ba// gti mug zhe sdang phrag dog spangs// sangs rgyas kun gyi byin
323b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlabs// de rnams la ni de nyid bshad// slob ma de ni yongasu gzung // da ni dngos grub ma lus pa'i// sgrub byed cho ga bshad par bya// lha rnams mgu bar ma byas na// bdag nyid nges par sun 'byin 'gyur// dur khrod la sogs gnas dag tu//
323b6(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan khrag 'thung sogs 'khor lo// rab tu mnyes par bya ba'i phyir// mdzes pa'i maN+Dal legs byas te// chu la sogs pa'i rnam lnga dang // ba byung mar sogs legs par byugs// 'byor pa'o yo byad tshogs gyur pas// rgyud las gsungs
324a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshul bzhin du// bskyed pa'i tshul gnas bla ma yi// dkyil 'khor bdag po bzlas pa ni// bsod nams che 'bring chung ba dag/ bye ma 'bum dang khris 'grub 'gyur// 'khor rnams gtso bo'i yan lag phyir// tha dad par ni bzlas
324a2(rgyud 'grel): mi bya// gal te mtshan ma mthong gyur nA~M// bzlas pa'i 'phro yang bshol bas 'grub// lha mi byin brlabs ldan gyur pas// dkyil 'khor mchog ni bri ba'i phyir// ri dang phrug dang tshing tshing ngam// yang na dur khrod dag gi ni// gdod nas grub pa'i gnas 'am
324a3(rgyud 'grel): 'on te rgya mtsho'i 'gram dag d+ha/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor legs bri'i phyir// yid 'ong gnas dang legs pa'i sa // bcos ma'i maN+Dal legs par brtsig// dri dang pa sogs bdud rtsis bran// grangs mnyam lha yI gnas dkod de// der ni yid 'ad me
324a4(rgyud 'grel): tog dgram// khrag 'thung 'khor lo rdzogs bskyed cing // skyo sogs nus pa ye shes lha// dgug sogs byas te dbang bskur nas// mchod bstod mthar ni gsol ba gdab// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag la dgongs// khyed rnams mchod pa'i phyir
324a5(rgyud 'grel): dang ni// slob ma rnams la phan pa yi// sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i// dkyil 'khor bzang po bri bar 'tshal// bdag la byin brlabs gnang bar mdzod// de ltar gsol ba gdab byas nas// mchod dang gtor ma nyer ldan pas// lha mo mdzes
324a6(rgyud 'grel): dga' bskul ba'i phyir// sngon byung sangs rgyas tshul dri bzhin// log pa sa la brab byas pas// sa 'og 'thon pa'i lha mo ni// gser mdog zhi ba'i rang bzhin can// rin chen mdzes pa'i rgyan cha can// gser gyi bum 'dzin ci bgyi zhes// de la
324b1(rgyud 'grel): mchod yon rkang bkru sogs// mchod dang gtor mas mnyes par bya// gzi brjid can gyis 'di skad smra// skyo ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyi// sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// shAkya seng+ge skyob
324b2(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa// de bzhin bdag gi bdud sde las// rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri// de skad lan gsum brjod nas ni// dga' ba'i mdangs kyi lha mo yang // khyod ni slob dpon yin pas ni// dkyil 'khor mchog gi las
324b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis shig/ zer nas sa la thim par mdzad// de nas phyogs skyong rnam dgra la// tshul bzhin gtor ma byin nas ni// sa phyogs gnas pa'i lha dang klu// gnod sbyin dri za lha ma yin// gang dag rdzu 'phrul che ldan pa// rdo rje spyan dang snyan mnga' ba//
324b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag ming che ge zhes bya bas// bde gshegs rnams la mchod pa dang // sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// dge ba'i sa phyogs 'di nyid du// dkyil 'khor dam pa cher 'byung ba// sangs rgyas thod pa rgyud rgyal gyi// dkyil 'khor chen po'i las
324b5(rgyud 'grel): byed pas// khyod kyis bar chad ma byed par// dge ba'i grogs po nyid du mdzod// lan gsum gsol ba 'debs pa ni// sa blang cho ga mdzes pa yin// de'i 'og mgul rgyan rna cha sogs// thal ba'i gos dang rgyan char ldan// dpal ldan
324b6(rgyud 'grel): khrag 'thung rgyal chen po// sa gzhi'i dbusu 'dug nas ni// rnal 'byor go rims rdzogs par bya// de tshe mkha'agro ma bzhi yi// gnas la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// mchod cing stong pas mnyes byas nas// dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtso bo ni//
325a1(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa ma lus zad byed pa'i// sangs rgyas thod pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// mgon po chen pos bshad du gsol// gsol ba'i tshig de mkhyen na su// snying rje 'gro la bltas nas ni// bgegs ni bskrad pa'i cho ga bya// khrag 'thung
325a2(rgyud 'grel): nga rgyal ldan pa yi// mig du ma dang Ta las ni// nyi ma zla ba gsal bsgom la// mig 'bras hUM las gyur pa yi// rdo rje mthing nag bsgom par bya// rkang pa gnyi su a las ni// sna tshogs rdo rje 'bar bas bsam// rdo rje lta ba'i mig 'bras las// khro tshogs
325a3(rgyud 'grel): spros pas bgegs gsal zhing // rkang 'gros rdo rje ra ba sprul// rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu dkrol// dbang ldan mtsham su song nas ni// nyon cig bgegs tshogs ma lus kun// lha dang lha min gsang ba pa// gnod par gyur pa'i bgegs tshogs rnams//
325a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor gtse// bde chen ye shes las byung ba// de ni he'u ka dpal dngos// bka'i 'khor lo rab sbyor byed// gal te bka' las 'das gyur na// rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba yi// mgo ni tshal pa rgyar 'gas shing // 'jigs par 'gyur
325a5(rgyud 'grel): ba gdon mi za// de bas gzhan du 'gro bar gyis// zhes brjod bgegs la bka' sgos nas// dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsamos nas ni// g.yas skor ldan gsum bgrod bya ba// bskal pa'i me bzhin 'od zer can// rkang pa'i 'og nas byung nas// gdug pa
325a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams ni sregs gyur pas// phan tshun 'byer bar gyur par bsam// g.yas dang g.yon du bskor ba dang // 'khyud dang ku tsa pa yi dang // b+ha ra ti dang sa ti ki/ pr-i te ka shi kyo la sogs// chags bcas tshul gyis sbyor bas ni// rol pas rab tu 'phyang ba
325b1(rgyud 'grel): dang / rol pa'i gom stabs bcas pa 'am// gom pa brgyad pas gar bya'o// rkang pa bskyod dang lag pa bskyod// smin ma 'degs dang rab dag 'brang // cung zad ngo tsha'i zla mig dang // brla rgyas lta na 'dud pa dang // mig yangs gar ni byed 'gyur zhing
325b2(rgyud 'grel): kha yi pad+ma'i 'dzum dang bcas// cung zad dmar ba'i mche ba 'chang // kun da ltar dkar so'i phreng // dpal ldan khrag 'thung rnal 'byor che// sems can grol ba rmad du byung // de la sogs pa'i gar gyis ni// bgegs kun ma lus bskrad par bya//
325b3(rgyud 'grel): hUM bzhi la sogs gsang sngags kyis// phur bu bskyed pa'i cho ga bya// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya// byin gyis brlab pa bzlas rdzogs nas// g+hA g+ha la sogs sngags kyis gang ba// de rjes ra ba dra ba sprul// dkyil 'khor gyis ni sa yi cha// mnyes dang yang dag
325b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan gyur pa// bgegs rnams gsal ba'i cho ga'o// sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// lag pa sa la phab byas te// hUM khaM zhes ni brjod pa yis// rnam dag na mkha' bsams nas ni// hU~M lam sngags kyi gser gyi ni// sa gzhi rdo rjer ldan par
325b5(rgyud 'grel): bsam// oM me di ni badz+rI b+ha ba ban+d+ha trAM/ rnyed pa'i sa phyogs de nyid du// zhi dang drag po me yi las// yang dag sel por byas nas ni// rnal gyi khyad par mkhas pa yi// lho phye'i rim pa shes byas la// g.yas skor lto nas brko bar bya// gseg ma mgal
325b6(rgyud 'grel): dum gyo mo dang // phug ma rus pa ro rnams gsal// sa de mi 'chi bcu phyed dang // dri zhim chu la hUM bzlas dgang // tshad ljon 'thad par bcags stengasu// chu sogs pa langs las byung dang // bdud rtsi lnga yis snyoms par byug// mkha 'gro ma rnams
326a1(rgyud 'grel): na tu na/ na can smra/ sa byung sa/ sa / sa / mas
326a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba bskyed// ji skad bshad pa'i shar mtho bas// myur du rig rnams zad par byed// dbus dma' ba'i rang bzhin gang // sgrub pa po ni 'joms dang ldan// mtshan nyid gsal bar shes par dpyad// de ltar 'dus byas sa de la// sangs rgyas thod
326a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// bdud rtsi lnga yi chus bran zhing // oM hUM d+hI hUM khaM hUM tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha badz+ra sa ma ya a d+hiSh+Tha ya de/ zhes brjod pa de stong par bsgom// sa spyad dus su 'byung chen la// gtor ma rab tu sbyin par bya// oM he ru ka badz+ra sa ma ya d+hi/ sarba duSh+TA nas
326a4(rgyud 'grel): ma ya mu dro/ pa b+hUT+Taka dz+hi ru lu ru lu dz+yo d+hU hU~M phaT/ de nas logs sbyang dri zhem nu// bdud rtsi lnga ldan byugs pa'i sar// thig le dri zhim me tog dgod// lhag 'thung rgyal po la sogs pa// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'khor lo bskyed// maM tse la sogs go brogo zhing /
326a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas gsum byin gyis brlabs rje su// ye shes 'khor los byin brlabs nas// dbang bskur rgyas gdab rim bya ba// mchod dang bdud rtsis tshim bya zhing // bstod pas mgon po mnyes byas la// btud de gsol ba gdab par bya// gnyis med ye
326a6(rgyud 'grel): shes las byung ba'i// khyab bdag dngos kun bdag cag nyid// ston pa'i gtso bo khrag 'thung dpal// sna tshogs sdo mar yang dag ldan// phyogs mtshams rnams kyi mkha'agro ma// rig pa'i lha mo rdzu 'phrul can// byang chub sems dpa' la sogs
326b1(rgyud 'grel): kun/ ma lus bdag la dgongasu gsol// slob ma rnams la phan pa dang // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// rdo rje can bdag 'di zhes pa// nang par dkyil 'khor 'bri bar 'tshal// rje su brtse bar nyer dgongs te// kun gyi byin gyis brlab tu gsol//
326b2(rgyud 'grel): lan gsum gsol ba gdab rje su// dri zhim me tog phreng ldan dang // thod pa bdud rtsi lnga ldan pas// dpal ldan khrag 'thung la sogs kun// bdug spos la sogs legs phul nas// de 'og rang gi dbugs dbyung ba// cho gas brtul zhugs kun bya'o//
326b3(rgyud 'grel): lha la gsol ba gdab cho ga'o// de'i 'og gser dngul la sogs rin chen las byung ba'i// zhabs phra lto che mgrin ring mchu phra nyi shu drug/ dri zhim dkar rtsis byugs shing nag nog ra ri med// pad+ma'i lte bar rang rang mtshan ma rnams kyis mtshan// ras
326b4(rgyud 'grel): dkar zung res bum pa'i mgul du bcing bar bya// chu ni 'o ma bsres pa chang dang bcas pa dang // rin chen rnam pa lnga bzhug cing // bum pa kun nas 'bru lnga dang // sman dang bdud rtsi sha lngar bcas// rnam par rgyal ba'i nang bcug ste// a mra'i lcug mas
326b5(rgyud 'grel): dgab par bya// bdugs bskrad bum pa byin brlabs nas// de rjes slob dpon blo chen gyis// sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor dang ldan// bum pa'i nang du bsgom bya ba// pad+ma'i steng du nyi ma ste// de steng ro yis yang dag mnan// de steng ye shes lnga las byung // gtso
326b6(rgyud 'grel): bo yab yum bsgom par bya// de nas bum pa gzhan dag/ yud tsam gyis ni lha mo rnams// rab tu gsal bar bskyod par bya// las kun byed pa'i bum pa la// sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan byas nas// cho ga gsum gyi bdud rtsi 'khyil// bskyed pa'i cho ga
327a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par bya// dkyil 'khor tshul du bkod byas la// go cha bgos dang gnas gsum brlab// dbug sogs dbang bskur legs zin nas// thod pa'i mchod yon sngon 'gro bas// spos sogs lha bshos dag gi bar// lha yi bru
327a2(rgyud 'grel): dang mnyam par 'bul// nang dang gsang bar bcas pas kyang // bum pa'i lha rnams mnyes par bya// de bzhin sngar gsungs lha tshogs la'ang // mchod pa'i cho ga rab tu bya// de 'og bzlas pa dbul bya ba// rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la// snying po
327a3(rgyud 'grel): ngag gis mnyes par bya// de las gzhan pa rnams la ni// nye ba'i snying po rab tu sbyar// las kun byed pa rang sngagaso// gsol gdab gzhan dang mtshungs par bya// de ltar cho ga'i tshul dag ni// bum pa lhag par gnas pa'o// de nas slob ma'i gtso
327a4(rgyud 'grel): bo sogs// lhag gnas mchod par bya ba'i phyir// sngar bshad mtshan nyid dang ldan sogs// lus gtsang gos gtsang gyon pa dang // me tog snyim par rab bkang nas// mdzes pa'i maN+Dal phul rjesu// 'dod pa'i gsol gdab gus par brjod// dge'
327a5(rgyud 'grel): chen khyod bdag ston pa po// slob dpon khyod ni dgongasu gsol// byang chub sems dpa'i tshul brtan pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshalo// dam tshig de nyid bdag la gsol// byang chub sems kyang bdag la gsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/
327a6(rgyud 'grel): skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la gsol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal// de ltar gsol 'debs slob ma rnams// rang snying 'od kyi bur bas la// rna lam 'di skad bsgrag par bya// du tshur theg pa chen po la//
327b1(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te// gsang sngags spyod pa'i cho ga ni// khyod la yang dag bshad par bya// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang // de bzhin gang dag ma byon pa// da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa kun//
327b2(rgyud 'grel): de dag kun gyi gsang sngags kyi// cho ga bzang po 'di mkhyen nas// dpa' bo byang chub shing drung du// thams cad mkhyen pa tshad med brnyes// gsang sngags spyod pa mnyam med de// skyob pa dpal ldan he ru kas// bdud sde shin tu mi bzang ba// dpung
327b3(rgyud 'grel): chen dag kyang de yi bcom// de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir// bu yi blo gros 'di gyis shig/ gong nas gong gi sdom pa ni// bu khyod kyis ni bsrung bya ste// grol ba'i rgyu ni de las gzhan// thabs ni gang yang yod ma yin// mkha 'gro'i yan lag las/
327b4(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i// bshags pa la sogs slob ma la// byang chub thob pa'i don gyi phyir// cho ga thams cad tshogs par spyad// bdag gi sdig pa bgyis pa dang // bgyid du stsal dang yi rang dang // sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas ni// ma lus so sor
327b5(rgyud 'grel): bshags par bgyi// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // rang rgyal dgra bcom 'gro rnams kyi// bsgom dang bzlas brjod bsod nams rnams// tshogs dag la ni yi rang ngo // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// rtag tu bdag ni
327b6(rgyud 'grel): skyabasu mchi// sangs rgyas thod pa mkha' 'gro ma// 'khor lo gsum gyi bdag nyid can// kun la rtag tu skyabasu mchi// dpa' bo dpa' mo dbang lha mo// byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid che// khyad par du yang slob dpon la// rtag tu bdag ni skyabasu
328a1(rgyud 'grel): mchi// dpal ldan khrag 'thung dpa' bo dang // rnal 'byor ma dang snang mdzad sogs// byang chub sems dpa' dpag med sogs// thams cad bdag la dgongasu gsol// che go dus 'di nas bzung nas// ji srid gnyis meng
328a2(rgyud 'grel): la gnas par// de yi tshangs spyod gnyis med pa// byang chub mchog sems bskyed par bgyi// bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams kyi// sangs rgyas myur du bsgrub byas te// sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las// bla med gnasu bsgral bar bgyi// yud tsam
328a3(rgyud 'grel): slob ma ltar byas nas// gnas gsum thig le bkod pa'i sar// rdo rjes mtshon pa'i 'bru gsum bsgom// sku gsung thugs kyi mchen mar gyur// de dkyil 'bru gsum nus mchog gis// bkug bstims lha ru gsal byas la// spyi bor me tog
328a4(rgyud 'grel): mdun du spos// dri dang mar me snying gar te// lha bshos zhal du stan la sgra'o// u dum+ba ra a shwata sogs// ser bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam la// skyon bral me tog cer bcings sbyin// shar ram byang du kha~M ltas te// mi smra bar ni so shing bca'// bko
328a5(rgyud 'grel): tsam lci byugs pa'i sar// so shing mdun ni drang por dor// de tshe rang la blta ba dang // rtse mo gyen du 'greng gyur na// dngos grub mchog tu de bshad do// mtshams dang byang du bltas pa na// 'jig rten pa yi dngos grub thob// de bzhin gzhan
328a6(rgyud 'grel): du kha bltas na// dngos grub 'bring po nyid du 'gyur// so shing bor ba brgya zhig la// gal te thur du kha bltas na// de ni nges par sa 'og gi/ dngos grub dag la the tshom med// oM hriHla sogs gsang sngags kyis// sbyor mo bsdams pa'i chu blung bya// 'jig
328b1(rgyud 'grel): rten du ni kun mkhyen kyang // su dum+ba rab me tog lngar// baN+Da la ma nA nir 'ga' zhig/ 'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung // gsung sngags spyad pa'i rdul 'di ni// de bas kyang ni rnyed dkar ste// glang gis sems can mnyam med don// bla na med par byed nus pa// gnyis med
328b2(rgyud 'grel): zab mo'i spyod tshul 'dis// sems can sangs rgyas thob byed pa'o// dang po bskal pa grangs med nas// bsags pa'i sdig pa gang dang gang // de kun zad par gyur pa ni// zab mo'i dkyil 'khor mthong bas so// de rjes 'bru gsum sngags mchog gis//
328b3(rgyud 'grel): ku sha byin gyis brlab byas te// sngas dang stan du gding bar byas// gtso bo'i snying pos rab bzlas pa'i// srang bu dmar la mdud pa gsum// byas te dpung pa g.yon par bcing // seng+ge'i nyal stangs bstan byas te// ku sha'i stan la khyod nyol la// nang par
328b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin bzangs rnams longs shig/ sang gi nang par khyod rnams kyis// dpal ldan sangs rgyas thod pa yi// grong khyer chen po mthong zhes brjod// de nas rang snying sa bon las// sngags zhugs mdun du lha rnams sprul// phyi nang bdag nyid can gyis kyang //
328b5(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan khrag 'thung la sogs pa'i// 'khor lo rnams ni rab tu mchod// 'byung po rnams kyang mgu bar bya// nang par gyi ni dus dag tu// rmi lam mtshan ma dri bar bya// des kyang mtshan ma gang mthong rnams// 'dzem pa med par smra bar bya// gal te bzang
328b6(rgyud 'grel): na dngos grub bstan// ngan na bgegs rnams bzlog par bya// slob ma lhag gnas cho ga'o// de ltar lhag par gnas byas nas// shes rab can gyi nang par dus// thig dag gdab par bya ba'i phyir// slob dpon mtshan nyid sngar gsungs pas// thod pa las
329a1(rgyud 'grel): byas spyi bor 'chang // yan lag thal bas rnam par byugs// lus la phyag rgya drug la sogs// kha T+wAM ga ni lag na thogs// brgya phyed phreng bas rnam par brgyan// he ru ka dpal rang byas te// 'khor la bltas pas snying gar dgod
329a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid gsal bar go gyon cing // sngags dang phyag rgyas brgyan nas ni// dngos grub mchog gi stsol ba yi// dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya// ga mi ta ka la sogs pas// ma ra ru d+hi ras spangs pas// rab shes dkyil 'khor nyis
329a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur sogs// tshad ldan srad bu bkal byas nas// khrag 'thung grong khyer nyams dga' ba// ji srid mtho lnga nas brtsams nas// bcu gnyis bcu drug mthar thug par// rnal 'byor dbang phyug dam pa yi// shes rab can gyi thig gdab ste//
329a4(rgyud 'grel): srang bu kha dog sna lnga ru// rnam par phye ste bcos nas ni// thod pa'i snod bzhag ngag mos pas// sa bon las byung rigs lngar bskyed// dpal ldan khrag 'thung la sogs kun// spyan drangs nas ni de ru bzhug/ sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro ma/
329a5(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo'i sngags dang gnyis med pas// pad+ma'i snod la legs bzhag cing // rang byung me tog ngag gis mchod// ye shes srud byed byas nas su// mkhas pas thig ni gdab bya ba// sngon chad cho ga mthong ba yis// ye shes thig skud gdab bya'i
329a6(rgyud 'grel): phyir// bla mas khu tshur gyis bzung zhing // gcig ni mtha' ru shi sha yis// dbugs 'byin 'gro bar bsam na su// thig gnyis ngag ni legs par bsgril// gnyisu med pa'i gsang sngags kyis// bsgril nas thig ni der bya'o// dz+nyA NAM zhes pas leg
329b1(rgyud 'grel): btang zhing // blo ldan rgyab nas 'greng bar bya// dang po byang dang lho yi ni// sgo dbus ji bzhin gnas nas su// lho ru mngon par phyogs nas su// de bzhin na mkha'i thig gdab po// nub dang shar nas gnyis pa gdab// oM badz+ra sa ma ya sU tra mA ti kra ma hUM/ dwe
329b2(rgyud 'grel): rjes g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis// lte ba'i phyogasu bzung nas kyang // shar du bltas nas 'gro mgon gyis// sa la tshangs pa'i thig gnyis gdab// thig skud ngag ni 'debs pa'i tshe// 'jig rten khams ni ma lus pa'i// sangs rgyas la sogs 'gro ba'i
329b3(rgyud 'grel): don// khyed kyi dus ni yon zhes bskul// bla ma nyid dam grogs mchog gis// g.yon nas bskor ba shin tu brtson// rlung dang dbang ldan phyogs gnas dang // me dang bden bral khar gnas te// bla mas mtsham su thig gnyis gdab// byang nas mngon
329b4(rgyud 'grel): par bltas nas ni// bden bral du ni srad bu bsgreng // me yi phyogasu gnas pa dang // dbang ldan phyogasu gnas pa yis// shar gyi thig ni gang yin pa// brtul zhugs can gyis cho gas gdab// phyogs skor la sogs dbye shes pas// kun gyi
329b5(rgyud 'grel): thig ni thams cad kyang // bla ma'i man ngag rim thob pas// bla ma mkhas pas thig gdab bo// bla ma mer gnas bden bral dang // bla ma rlung dang dbang ldan du// gnas byas lho byang thig gdab po// ra ba me ri bor byas pa'o// cha ldan bcu drug rab
329b6(rgyud 'grel): dbye bya// dbang po drug ni nang dor nas// gnyis gsum bdun pa bzhi bzhir dbye// bzhi pa de bzhin lnga dang brgyad// dbus ma dor ba'i cho ga bya// gtso bo'i pho brang cha chen gcig/ lte ba ze'u 'bru ldan par gdab// pad+ma rim gsum 'dab ma brgyad// cha chen
330a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum gyi sa yin te// cha phran gsum gsum pad+ma ste// cha phran re re rdo rje phreng // sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad cha ste// khyams ni de yi phyed du bya// sgo khyud dag ni sgo yi tshad// tshon sna lnga yang de yi phyed// rin chen pha gu tshon gyi tshad// nyis
330a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur dra ba dra phyed yin// sgo yi sum gyur rta babs te// ba dan dril bu 'od zer gyis// brgyan par thams cad thig gdab cing // gdugs dang 'khor lo ri dgas bcas// phyogasu rdo rje rgya gram mdzes// phyi rgya ra ba mi ri ste// brgyad du ma gtogs cha
330a3(rgyud 'grel): chen gcig/ rim gnyis thig ni gdab par bya// dang po dkar rtsi thig sogs las// rim bzhin thig gdab nges par bya// de steng ye shes thig btab pas// kun nas yongasu brkyang bar bya// rdul tshon sngon po ro bsregs pa'i// sol ba nag pos bya
330a4(rgyud 'grel): ba yin// rdul tshon dmar po dur khrod kyi// so phog las ni bya bar bshad// de bzhin rdul tshon ljang khu ni// nim pa'i 'dab ma dag las so// rdul tshon dkar po'i rgyu dag ni// mai rus phyed ma dag la so// rdul tshon ser po'i rgyud dag ni// yung ba'i phye
330a5(rgyud 'grel): ma ngag las bya'o// de ltar rdul tshon lnga rnams kyis// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de ltar dur khrod sa rnams ni// dbang phyug chen po'i rgyan yin phyir// lnga po lngar ni rab sprul bya// ye shes thig gi cho ga bzhin// bskyed pa'i lha sogs
330a6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par bya// sems dag nang par langs nas ni// dkyil 'khor las ni rab tu brtsam// 'od ni chos dbyings dag pa ste// sems can khams ni rab grol byed// sangs rgyas thod pa rgyal chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// nyes pa
330b1(rgyud 'grel): ma lus rang na pa'o// chen gyi las la yang dag 'jug/ slab dpon gyi sman dang par ni// g.yon pa'i khu tshur sar bzhag ste// dbang ldan mtshams nas brtsams nas// mo lnga pa d+ha d+ha g+h+ra/ tshon dang 'bri ba'i las byung pa// dam tshig sdom bya b+hA/
330b2(rgyud 'grel): par sbyin// the'u chu dang mthe bo spangs// drangs te mtho bar yang dag bri// g.ya su bskor zhing rgyun mi bcad// sngon zhing dkar ba ser ba dang // pad+ma rA ga man ta bzhin// rab tu bsgrims te bri bar bya// phyi nas kun tu slob mas so// gal te ri mo che
330b3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam zhing // mo zhing dum 'dang chad pa yang // ri mo dma' bas mi 'grub cing // g.yon pos gdung ba skyed par byed// chad pas slob dpon slob ma dag/ gnyis ka 'chi bar shes par bya// dpyir mtshan ldan ri ma ni// mtshan nyid kun gyis
330b4(rgyud 'grel): legs par mtshan// pho brang rim gsum zlum po la// rdo rje gsum gyi yongasu bskor// phyi rol gru bzhi lham pa la// sgo bzhir rta babs rnams kyis brgyan// ba dan rnam pa bzhi yis rgyun// dri ba dra ba phyed pas spras// phyi rol kha khyer dag pa
330b5(rgyud 'grel): dang // rin chen pha gur yang dag ldan// pad+ma nyi shu rtsa lnga yis// gdan rnams kyis ni shin tu mdzes// de la rim pa dang pi ni// 'dab brgyad sna tshogs lte bar bcas// pad+ma'i lte ba sngon po bri// dkar ser dmar zhing gnag pa ste// shar dang byang
330b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs phyogs kyi rdul// mtshams bzhir mdzes pa'i kha dog can// bdud rtsis gang ba'i thod pas mdzes// rdo rje phreng ba'i sngon pos brgyan// de 'og rim pa gnyis pa ni// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dmar po la// rtsibs mtshan ljang gus yang
331a1(rgyud 'grel): ngag b+hI// pad+ma dmar po'i phreng bas brgyan// rim gsum pa yi 'khor lo na// rtsibs brgyad kha dog dkar po las// rtsibs mtshan kha dog nag po bri// de yang rdo rje ra bas brgyan// dkar ba'i tshon gyis legs pa'o// sgo bzhir rigs
331a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi rim ji bzhin// sgo ma bzhi ni nges par gnas// pho brang dbus kyi lte ba la// ro steng rdo rje nag po dang // gri gug dmar po legs par dgod// pad 'dab 'khor lo rnams kyi steng // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// gri gug lha mo'i mdog bzhin bri//
331a3(rgyud 'grel): sgo bzhi rnam su 'ang de bzhin// de dag tshon gyi cho ga'o// de ltar yid 'ong sna tshogs pa'i// lha rnams gzhal yas khang mdzes pa// de skad gsungs pa rdzogs par bya// sna tshogs gos dang rgyal mtshan dang // bla re la sogs bri ba dang // spos dang ma
331a4(rgyud 'grel): tog la sogs pa'i// mchod pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par brgyan// rgyan chu che ldan bla ma yis// rang gi rnal 'byor rdzogs byas la// bde ba chen po skyer byed pa'i// khrag 'thung rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ rnga tshon bris pa'i khang pa la// mtshan nyid
331a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa bskyed par bya// pad+ma nyi ma nyi shu lnga// gdan rnams shin tu mdzes pa la// de yi dbus chung sa bon ni// yi ge hUM gi rang bzhin sngo// skad cig tsam gyis he ru ka/ sku mdog sngon po grags chen po// g.yas gri gug cang te'u 'dzin// g.yon na
331a6(rgyud 'grel): thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ skyil krung phyed pa'i 'jigs chen po// zhal gyi mche ba cung zad bcigs// ral po'i cod pan gyis brgyan cing // sangs rgyas thod pa'i cod pan can// dbu la sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan// zla ba phyed pas 'dzin pa'i lha// sku la thal bya'i
331b1(rgyud 'grel): rdul gyis byugs// dpa' bo phyag bzhi phyag mtshan 'chang // shin tu hUM sgrogs 'jigs byed pa// gar gyi stabs kyis rnam par bzhugs// mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng ba can// mchod phyir thogs pa'i phreng ba 'chang // thod pa gti mug rnam dag pa'i// phreng
331b2(rgyud 'grel): babargyus pas brgyan pa'i lha// mgul ngo dang ni 'khor lo dang // rkang gdub dang ni dpung rgyan dang // gdub bu skyed pa'i ske rags dang // dpa' bo rna cha mchog gis brgyan// 'di 'dra'i gzugs can gtso bo ni// hUM zhes bzlas pa byed par bsgom// de las
331b3(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i rnal 'byor ma// nyi shu rtsa bzhi bdag nyid rnams// sku mdog sna tshogs grags chen mo// shin tu 'jigs pa'i gtsigs can ma// zhal gcig phyag ni thod pa 'chang // g.yas pa na ni gri gug 'dzin// so so yi ni ming ji bzhin// rab tu
331b4(rgyud 'grel): gsal bar bshad par bya// rim pa dang po'i phyogs bzhi ni// phreng bzang ma dang 'dod can ma// 'jigs ma dang ni thub dka' ma// mtsham su thod pas yang dag brgyan// rim gnyis gsung gi 'khor lo la// bde ba'i ske rags can dang ni// gzugs
331b5(rgyud 'grel): can 'byung gnas rnam rgyal ma// shar sogs phyogs bzhir g.yon rim gnas// thod can ma dang mtshon chen ma// rgyud byed ma dang gsong byed ma// dbang ldan mtshams sogs g.yas rim bzhugs// rim gsum sku yi 'khor lo la// sgrol byed
331b6(rgyud 'grel): ma dang 'jigs ma dang // lha mo mi pham ma bzhi ni// shar phyogs lugs 'jug phyogs bzhir ro// dge ma 'dzur byed ma dang ni// dus mtshan ma dang grags chen ma// dbang ldan mtshams sogs lugs las bzlog/ mdzes sdug ma dang nor
332a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin ma// bskal bzang ma dang grags mthong ma// shar sogs sgo bzhir yang dag gnas// 'di lta bu yis dkyil 'khor mchog/ kha dog rnam pa lnga yis brgyan// de yi dbus gnas lha mo ni// he ru ka la bde ster ma// skyil krung
332a2(rgyud 'grel): phyed pa'i gar byed ma// mi yis rus pa'i phreng bas brgyan// lha mo 'od zer dpag dka' zhing // skra ser gyen du 'bar ba ste// hUM gi bdag nyid las skyes 'jigs// zhal nas khrag gi 'thor byed ma// dkar mo nag mo ljang gum// thams cad khu ba
332a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan gyur ma'o// lha yi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa ni// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid bsrungs// mdog dang phyag mtshan cha lugs gdan// sgrub pa'i thabs bzhin bsgom par bya// sngar gsungs sta gon lha rnams ni// snying ga nyid nas rab sprul nas// dkyil
332a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la ni byin gyis brlabs// yang ni snying ga'i sa bon gyis// ye shes lha rnams bkug byas te// dkyil 'khor lha rnams byin gyis brlabs// oM bud+d+ha ka pA lI ni aHkhaM gr-i puM shrI aHaHaHhUM hUM hUM phaT/ rtsa yi 'khor lo 'jigs tshul gyis//
332a5(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur rgyas gdab phun sum tshogs// ma lus pa ni 'dir bya'o// de nas me tog spos la sogs// lha yi grangs dang mnyam par dbul// de bzhin gos ni zung res mchod// rang byung me tog la sogs pa'i// bdud rtsi lngas kyang de bzhin mchog/ thong
332a6(rgyud 'grel): pa bdud rtsi lngas bkang ba// he ru ka yis btung bar bya// de yis 'thungs pa tsam gyis ni// 'gro ba'i bla ma bdag nyid che// gtso bo las gzhan tha dad gzugs// rnal 'byor ma kun de dang 'dra// 'dod pa'i yon tan sna tshogs dang // tshogs kyi sbyor ba che
332b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan zhing // na mkha' ca tse'i sgras bkang nas// bkra shis glu yis bstod bya zhing // bzlas pa yis kyang mgu bar bya// lto ba'i gnasu sbyin sreg bya// pad+ma'i 'dab ma brgyad ldan du// khrag 'thung mkha 'gro nyi shu lnga// ge sar pad+ma'i lte ba la// bdag nyid lha yi
332b2(rgyud 'grel): dngos byas nas// sbyin sreg cho ga ldan byas na// lngapa mi dgos par dngos grub 'gyur// bza' dang bca' btung myang ba dang // btul zhugs can gyi ci spyod pa// ye shes bdud rtsi lnga nyid du// bsgrubs te thams cad spyad par bya// bdag nyid lha ni lha yi
332b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog/ bdag nyid lha ni lha dam pa// rang gi gzugs la ma chags pas// gzugs brnyan la sogs bzhin du shes// bdag nyid sangs rgyas ma lus dang // mkha'agro ma kun gnas yin te// de phyir rtsol ba ma lus kyis// bdag nyid he ru ka
332b4(rgyud 'grel): dpal mchod// bra khur la sogs bza' ba dang // zan dron shA dang nya shaM dang // bdud rtsi lnga sogs ci 'byor pa// thod pa'i nang du legs bzhag ste// sbrang sogs rim gyis byin brlabs nas// zhing sbyong rnams la gtor ma sbyin// mchod pa'i bya ba
332b5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs gyur nas// slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga yis// dang po nyid du slob dpon gzhug/ mtshan nyid ldan pa'i slob ma'i tshogs// khrus byas mdzes pa'i gos gyon te// bu sdug de dag rnams kyi ni// gdod pa dar gyi g.yogs byas nas// gsol ba
332b6(rgyud 'grel): 'debs pa sngon du 'gro/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku// slob dpon la ni skyabasu mchi// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma 'khor lo// rnal 'byor gnas la bdag phyag 'tshal// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon po bdag ni gzhug tu gsol// don dam
333a1(rgyud 'grel): smra ba'i seng ge rnal 'byor zhes bya ba// nyon mongs spyod pa'i don la shin tu mkhas gyur pa// srid pa'i nyes brgya bskyed pa'i nyon mongs gcod mdzad pa// rnal 'byor don dam rgyal po de nyid grub par mdzod// lan gsum du ni
333a2(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba gdab// de nas slob dpon gyis kye khyod su zhes smra'o// slob mas bdag ni rgyal ba'i sras zhes smra'o// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// he ru ka dpal grong khyer mchog/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni// bdag gi slob ma bzhug
333a3(rgyud 'grel): par bgyi// de nas lho sgor mngon phyogs nas// dkyil 'khor mkha' 'gro tshogs dag la// sgo gsum dang bas phyag btsal ba// oM na mo ste hUM/ na ma mi hUM/ na mo na maHhUM swA hA/ zhes brjod sku gsung thugs kyi ni// sgo nas lan gsum sngon 'gro
333a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag/ oM sarba bI ra yo gi nI pU dze pas+tha nA ya At+ma nA/ nIr+ya ta ya mi sarba ta tha ga ta bI ra yo gi ni/ At+ma ma le A d+hi tiSh+Tha sA maM/ zhes brjod lus ni thams cad kyi// gus pas rab tu phyag 'tshalo// de nas shar gyi sgor gnas la// snying ga'i g.yon
333a5(rgyud 'grel): du thal mo sbyar// oM sarba bI ra yo gi ni pu dze pas+tha nA ya/ a b+hiShe ka ya At+ma nAM/ nir+yA tA ya mi sarba ta tha ga ta bI ra yo gi ni/ At+ma ka ma d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mA/ de rjes byang gi sgor phyogs shing // thal mo de nyid bral bar gzhag/ oM sarba bA ra yo gi ni//
333a6(rgyud 'grel): pU dza pra brta nA ya/ At+ma nAM/ nir+yA tA ya mi sarba ta thA ga ta bi ra yo gi ni At+ma mau ma pra b+ha d+hi na maM/ de nas nub kyi sgor 'dug la// thal mo de nyid mgor bzhag ste// oM sarba bI ra yo gi ni/ pu dza karma At+ma mAM nir+yA tA ya mi sarba ta thA ga ta bI ra yo gi ni/ At+ma
333b1(rgyud 'grel): Ar+ya kar+Na ku ru mAM/ byin gyis brlab phyir phyag bzhi btsal// de nas lho sgor 'dug nas kyang // las ni bum pa'i chu yis gtor// slob ma'i lag pa bzung byas la// sangs rgyas thod pa'i sdom pa mchog/ brjod de thams cad sbyin par bya// sangs rgyas chos
333b2(rgyud 'grel): dang dge 'dun te// dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu gdong // 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs yin te// sdom pa rtag par gyur pa'o// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya ni// blo chen khyod kyi gzung bar bgyi// byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// shes rab dril bu shes rab grags//
333b3(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon khyod kyis gzung bar bya// bla ma spangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// 'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig sdom pa yin par bshad// rin chen rigs la rtag tu ni// nyin re bzhin nam lan drug tu// chos dang zang zing mi 'jigs byams// sbyin
333b4(rgyud 'grel): pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin// phyi dang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// dam pa'i chos kyang ma lus gzung // 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig yid du 'ong ba'o// las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang dag nyid du
333b5(rgyud 'grel): gzung bar bgyi// mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus kyi// de ltar sdom pa bzung nas ni// me tog phreng dang bcas pa yis// snying gar rdo rje rab gzhag la// oM badz+ra yo ga tsit+ta ut+pA tA ya mi/ oM su ra ste se ma ya s+t+wa~M ho sid+d+hi badz+ra ya tha su khaM/ rnal 'byor du
333b6(rgyud 'grel): ni sems bskyed do// yongasu sbyangs pa'i bu sdug de// las kun byed pa'i chus gtor la// dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug par bya// oM A khaM bI ra hUM/ deng khyod dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi rigasu zhugs kyis/ ngas khyod la dpal he ru ka'i ye
334a1(rgyud 'grel): shes bskyed par bya ste/ ye shes gang gis khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na/ dngos grub gzhan lta ci smos/ khyod kyis dkyil
334a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ma mthong ba'i// mdun du smra bar mau bya ste// dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re// he ru ka dpal deng khyod kyi// snying la yang dag bzhugs pa ni// gal te tshul 'di smras na ni// de ma thag tu dral te gshegs// rje su mna' chu blud pa ni// tsan+dan
334a3(rgyud 'grel): dang ni ga bur bcas// bde 'byung me tog chu dang ldan// blo gros brtan pa'i slob ma la// mtshan ldan thod par blugs nas ni// gzi brjid can gyi 'di skad smra// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs
334a4(rgyud 'grel): na dngos grub 'gyur// oM pany+tsa a mr-i ta ud ka Tha Na rdza hUM/ deng nas brtsams te khyod kyi dpal he ru ka nga yin gyi ngas gang 'di byos shig bsgo ba de khyod kyis bya'o// khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig/ khyod mi bde ba ma spangs par dus
334a5(rgyud 'grel): byas nas dmyal bar gyur ta re/ de rjes slob ma'i gtso bo yis// dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma// thams cad kyis ni byin rlobs la// he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor ma// bdag la ye shes dbab tu gsol// sngar gsungs rgyan ldan bla ma yis// gzi
334a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan bsgyings bcas slob ma la// mi 'chi bcu phyed ro ras dang // byi brun gu gul nag po dang // grir shi glang khrag tshil chen bcas// rang skra dang bcas zhib mor brdungs// pad+ma'i snod du rab gzhag nas// dur khrod yi dgas mes gdungs la// gnyis
334b1(rgyud 'grel): med sngags kyis gtsun par bya// dril bu'i sgra ni rab bsgrags nas// rang nyid 'od kyis mkha' gro gzhug/ gal te 'bab par ma gyur na// slob ma'i snying gar nyi ma la// sangs rgyas thod pa yum bcas shing // yungs kar tsam gyi skur bsams la/
334b2(rgyud 'grel): de yi gsang dang mkha' spyod pas// 'od zer dmar pos lus kun yang // ros gang gcig gyur sngags bzlas shing // bdug dang bsam gtan cho ga yis// skad cig nyid la dpa' bo dang // mkha'agro 'khor bcas snying la 'jug/ oM tiSh+Tha ma hA kr-i
334b3(rgyud 'grel): d+ha a be sha hUM/ oM shrI he ruM kA ya/ bid+ma he bir+ya rA dzA ya d+ha mi he swA hA/ mkha 'gro bskul bas nges par 'bab// lce la a ni dmar bsams nas// gsungs shig rdo rje dge mi dge/ sku gsung thugs la phebs gyur nas// brtan pa'i gsang sngags
334b4(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya// 'dir ni bsod nams ji lta bu// lha rnams rigs kyi rim ji bzhin// 'di ni dngos grub gang yin pa// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni de bzhin shog/ pra tIts+tsha dang badz+ra ho// dkyil 'khor du ni me tog dor// gang rnyed de yi rigs yin te// dbukra
334b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs mtshan ma shes byas la// slar yang slob ma'i mgo la bcing // sha mig dag pa'i ltas kyi phyir// ci mthong dri ba'i cho ga bya// de nas lag pa nas bzung ste// mig phyed dkyil 'khor bstan par bya// he ru ka dpal deng khyod kyi// mig 'byed
334b6(rgyud 'grel): par ni brtson par mdzad// phye bas thams cad mthong 'gyur te// rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med// oM badz+ra nai tra ya a pa ha ra pa Ta laM hrI/ dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos// da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed// khyod ni rnal 'byor ma rigs skyes// sngags dang
335a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs// 'gro don phun smram tshogs kun dang // dngos grub kun mkhyen sngon du 'gyur// dam tshig thams cad bskyang ba dang // gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis// de nas dkyil 'khor 'khor li yi// lha mi
335a2(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog ji bzhin dang // mtshan ma la sogs de bzhin du// slob ma rnams la bstan par bya// sna tshogs pad+ma'i dkyil stengs nas// gnyisu med par legs 'khyud pa'i// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin can// dngos grub ma lus stsol ba po// khrag
335a3(rgyud 'grel): 'thung che la bu khyod ltos// sna tshogs sde mas gtsor mdzad pa'i// phreng bzang ma sogs lha oM lnga// thod pa bzhi por bcas pa yi// rab zab thugs kyi 'khor lo dang // dge ba'i ske rags can la sogs// gsung gi rnam dag 'khor lo dang // sgrol
335a4(rgyud 'grel): byed mkha' gro ma la sogs// rnam dag sku yi 'khor lo ste// rab dang 'bring dang tha ma can// mdzes sdug la sogs lha mo bzhi// gzugs sogs dag pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur// lha rnams de nyid mtshan ma yin// de nas slob ma blo ldan gyis// bla ma'i
335a5(rgyud 'grel): zhabs la phyag 'tshal te// yon gyi mchog chen phul nas// dbang skur don du gsol ba gdag// he ru ka dpal dbang sgrub pa// 'gro ba skyob cing gzi brjid can// de ltar yon tan 'byung gnas sogs// de bzhin bdag la deng gsol cig/ dpa'
335a6(rgyud 'grel): bo chen pos mi ldog pa'i// dbang bskur ba ni bdag la gsol// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon bgyid// 'jug sgo lho yi phyogasu ni// bdag nyid he ru ka dpal sems// pad+ma 'dab brgyad bris stengasu// seng+ge'i khri ni bsham
335b1(rgyud 'grel): bya ste// sna tshogs mdzes pa'i stan bting la// gnyis med blo ldan der bzhag skye// he ru ka dpal sprul par bya// gdug dkar stengs du phub nas kyang // dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs kyis// bkra shis sgra yis legs gang ba// rol mo snyan drang glu dbyangs
335b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams// na mkha' ca co yis bkang ste// dbang bskur bar ni 'dod pa yin// de la bar chod zhi ba'i phyir// yungs kar rnal 'byor pa yis kyang // bzlas brjod cho ga bzhin byas la// gsang sngags brjod nas brdegs par bya// de 'og lag gnyis 'dab
335b3(rgyud 'grel): rtse yis// bum pa rnams bteg sngags pa yis// lus nang rtogs gyur dkyil 'khor la// cho ga'i tshul gyis dbang bskur bya// rnam rgyal la sogs bum pa'i chu// lhag ma med par bsdu byas la// glu blang dril bu la sogs brdung // dpa' bo rnal
335b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ma lus kun// bsgom la thams cad dbang bskuro// dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni// khams gsum pa yi gnas las byung // khams gsum kun gyis phyag 'tshal ba// chu yis dbang bskur sbyin par bya// oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes// brjod de
335b5(rgyud 'grel): rang snying 'od las byung // rig pa'i lha mo rdzu 'phrul can// bdud rtsi chu yi bkru bar bya// dbu rgyan rin chen rgyu las byung // dar bcangs bcings pa dbang bskur te// thor tshugs cad pan gyis brgyan pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa yis//
335b6(rgyud 'grel): rin chen dam pa'i dbu rgyan dang // dar dpyangs dbang bskur sbyin par bya// oM badz+ra pa taM ka badz+ra a ra li ho// rdo rje chen po rtse dgu pa// de nyid ldan pa byin brlabs nas// sang+yas rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas// de ring khyod la dbang bskur bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas
336a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad nyid// shin tu grub phyir rdo rje zung // oM badz+ra a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ lag tu byin la dbang bskur bya// thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje
336a2(rgyud 'grel): snyems tshul bdag po bdag/ 'di ni rnal 'byor ma kun gyi// shes rab dbyangs kyi rjer 'gror bshad// khyod kyi kyang ni rtag tu bcang // byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed// de dus dril bu'i sgra bsgrags la// srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ ngo bo nyid kyis dngos
336a3(rgyud 'grel): med byas// rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' rnams// srid pa'i dam pa byed par shog/ aM shrI he ru ka a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM/ a b+hi Shin tsa tiSh+Tha bI ra sa ma ya/ dril bu g.yon du sbyin par bya// rdo rje dril bu yang dag 'khyud// g.yon bsnyems pa dang spros
336a4(rgyud 'grel): gnon 'chang // gnyis med gnyis med rnal 'byor bdag/ phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs// byin rlabs che ldan sngags kyis ni// sngags kyis dbang bskur sbyin par bya// oM shrI he ru ka a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ hrI he ru kanA ma a b+hi She ka tA/
336a5(rgyud 'grel): shrI yi sgra dang bcas pa yis// ming gi dbang bskur byin par bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// he ru ka dpal phyag na gnas// khyed kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // he ru ka dpal brtul zhugs brtan// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+d+h+ya badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha e
336a6(rgyud 'grel): Sha s+t+rai d+ha rA ya mi hUM ha ha ha ho// 'dis ni rdo rje'i brtul zhugaso// kha T+wAM Da ma ru bzangs bcas// byin gyis brlab cing dbang bskur bya// he ru ka dpal kha T+wAM ga/ rnal 'byor ma ni Da ma ru// rdo rje kha T+wAM rdo rjer bcas// dril bu sil sil sgra sgrogs shing // tshungs
336b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i skud thogs rnal 'byor bdag/ kha T+wAM ga dang rnal 'byor snod// dpa' bo chen pos blang bar gyis// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dgug dang // sdang dang dbye dang mnan la sogs// sad dang bskrad pa ma lus pa'i// las rnams de ni sgrub par gyis// ral gri
336b2(rgyud 'grel): mig sman sa 'og dang // mchil lham de bzhin dril bu ste// rnal 'byor ma yi dngos grub sgrub// de nas ci dgar sgrub par gyis// shAkya thub par bsgom byas la// lag g.yon gyis ni chos gos mtha'// g.yas kyi mi 'jigs phyag rgyar gnas//
336b3(rgyud 'grel): slob ma la ni lung bstan bya// he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor che// 'khor lo ma lus rnams gnas shing // he ru ka dpal lung bstan bzhin// mgrin gcig tu ni thams cad kyis// 'di ltar nga yis lung bstan te// he ru ka dpal de bzhin gshegs//
336b4(rgyud 'grel): dngos po mchog tu grub pa'i phyir// srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton// shrI he ru ka nA ma sarba tA thA ga tA tiSh+Tha sid+d+hi sa ma ya staM b+hur b+hu ba swaHde che he ru ka dpal dang // mkha' gro ma dang bla mar bcas// mgrin cig lung ston bsam par bya// de
336b5(rgyud 'grel): rjes dbugs dbyung sbyin pa ni// gsang chen mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// mthong ba dang ni bcug pa yis// sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur bar// khyod ni shin tu de ring gnas// dbang ni bskur ba tsam gyis kyang // slob ma yon tan bdag por 'gyur// /
336b6(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon nyid kyis bde ba yis// brtan dang g.yo kun dam tshig yin// sems dag tho rangs dus langs te// bza' dang bsrung ba la sogs pa'i// sdom pa'i bdag nyid can srung ngo // lus dang srog la mi lto bar// dam tshig dang ni sdom pa srudra//
337a1(rgyud 'grel): nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du// rtag tu bzlas la gzhol bar byos// gang tshe nyams na rnal 'byor pa// kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur// dgun zla 'bring po nas brtsams te// zla ba re re bsrung ba ni// gnyisu med pa'i 'khor lor
337a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas// tshes bcu dus su mchod par bya// sha dang chang sogs gang ci'ang rung // dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs// he ru ka sogs rab tu mchod// theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya// sems can don la rgyab phyogs min// 'khor ba dag kyang yong mi
337a3(rgyud 'grel): spang // mya ngan 'das la dgar mi 'gro// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma kun la// khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya'o// phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha dang // mtshan ma 'gom par mi bya'o// dam tshig rab bsrungs bsod nams kyis// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// bud
337a4(rgyud 'grel): med thams cad mthong ba na// g.yon nas lan gsum bskor byas la// spyi bos phyag ni byas nas kyang // lan gsum bar du gsol ba gdab// bdag gi ma khyod bu yin te// ji srid byang chub 'byung bar du// byang chub yan lag du ma las// byung ba'i rang gi 'o/
337a5(rgyud 'grel): skongs// gnyis med ye shes spyod ldan pa'i// bslab pa blang ba sngon 'gro bas// tshangs par spyod pa shin tu bsrung // dam tshig de la rtag gnas te// de sngon 'gro ba'i gsang ba yin// spyod dang grol ba'i gnas 'dod pa'i// yid la 'dod pa kun
337a6(rgyud 'grel): grub 'gyur// gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa// de ltar bdag gi bgyid par 'tshal// de ltar yongs smin slob ma la// gsang ba'i dbang mchog sbyin par bya// dper na bu che med pa'i khyim// shi ma thag tu spyong par 'gyur// de bzhin dbang dang bral na ni//
337b1(rgyud 'grel): mashes kun gyi snang pa nyid// dbang mchag zab 'dod slob ma yis// sna tshogs zas dang sna tshogs skom// sna tshogs chos mo mchog gsungs dang // tra~M zhim lnga dang me tog spos// 'di dag la sogs bla ma mchod// mchod yon zhabs bsil de bzhin khrus/
337b2(rgyud 'grel): glu yi mchod pa rnam mang bas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin no// 'di dag gis ni bla ma mchod// na chod ldan pa'i bu mo yang // mtshan nyid ldan pa dbul bar bya// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// dbang dus cho ga ji bzhin du// slob ma dang brtan gang
337b3(rgyud 'grel): zhig gis// shes rab ma la gsol ba 'debs// dri zhim pa yi dngos po yis// maN+Dal rnam pa lnga byas te// sangs rgyas kun gyi brgyan byas pa// bla ma che la gsol ba 'debs// shin tu dri med sems kyis ni// de nas 'dir ni gsol ba 'debs//
337b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba dag/ dpung gnyen khyod kyis bsgral du gsol// bdag ni rtsol chung skal dman zhing // sangs rgyas chos ni rnam par spangs// kye kye ston pa bla ma che// mgon po khyod kyis brtse bar mdzod// de nas slob dpon chen ldan pas// lha yi
337b5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor dang ldan pas// sngar gsung cho ga bzhin du ni// chu sogs dbang rnams bskur bar bya// gsang ba'i go 'phang 'di brjod bya// dam tshig phyag rgyar rab gsungs pa// yid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro// gang gi lus kun brtan byed pa// de ni phyag
337b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyar rab tu grags// slob ma la ni de brjod nas// bdag nyid rig pa lhan cig tu// yid dang rjes mthun bza' dang bca'// btung ba la sogs rjes spyad cing // kha la sogs par ga bur gyis// dri zhim mchog tu bsgos pa las// yid la 'phrog pa'i
338a1(rgyud 'grel): bgad pa dang // sgeg dang rol sogs sngar byas te// dbang po gnyis kyi snyoms 'jug pas// bde dga' rgya mtsho byung gyur pas// zhal du bza' ba'i rdzas mchog bstab// rdzas de rnams ni gsol ba dang // yid ni tshim zhing thugs
338a2(rgyud 'grel): dgyes phyir// a ti su kha zhes brjod do// khams gsum thabs dang shes rab gcig/ bde chen gnyis med ye shes gsal// slob ma nus dang ldan par 'gyur// de ltar dbang mchog bskur bas pas// mgon po sa bcu dang mnyam 'gyur// de nas
338a3(rgyud 'grel): gsang dbang thob gyur pa'i// slob ma bzang la bla ma yis// shes rab la brten ye shes kyi// dbang bskur bzang ba sbyin pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor bzang po'i phyi rol tu// sngar bzhin dkyil 'khor rdzogs bsgoms la// de yi dbus gnas bla ma ni//
338a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor can// me tog la sogs mchod pa dang // chang la sogs pa'i dga' ston gyis// mchod cing bstod pas mnyes byas la// yon mchog dam pa phul nas ni// bla ma che la gsol 'debs pa// bla ma lha mo dgyes
338a5(rgyud 'grel): mthong nas// tshig 'di dag ni smra bar byed// rnam par rtog pa mang po yis// g.yogs pa'i bag chags rab ldan pa// 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba bdag/ mdzes ma khyod kyis skyob par mdzod// grags chen snying rje ldan pa yis// lha mo des ni zhi
338a6(rgyud 'grel): bar mdzod// gsol ba btab rjes bla ma che// rang gi rnal 'byor rdzogs byas nas// dpa' bo rdzogs par mthong nas ni// rtsa yi 'khor lo las ni 'dzag/ 'dzag pa de las rnal 'byor ma// rnam mang brtse ba cher ldan pa// bder gshegs kun gyis
338b1(rgyud 'grel): byin brlabs ma// sna tshogs brgyan gyis rnam par klubaso// sna tshogs pa yi na bza' mnabs// gzugs ni lang tsho gzhon pas brgyan// lo ni bcu dang gnyis lon pa// phyag g.yas byang chub sems gang ba'i// bum pa a mra'i lcug bcas rnams//
338b2(rgyud 'grel): zhal ni rab bzhad dang pa yis// he ru ka ni rgyal gyur cig/ rgyal bar gyur cig ces smras pas// chu sogs bum pa gsang ba dag/ dbang bskur rje su shes rab kyi// dbang ni rab tu bskur bar bya// dper na pi wang sbyor kun tshogs// rgyud dang bral na brdung
